revised_title: In Memoriam: Celebrating the Lives and Contributions of Fellows of the Royal Society
tldr: This article pays tribute to several Fellows of the Royal Society who have passed away, highlighting their significant contributions to various scientific fields. The article discusses the lives and achievements of George Albert Boulenger, William McDougall, George Barger, Alfred William Porter, Herbert Henry Woollard, and Arthur Smithells, emphasizing their impact on science and their roles in shaping the scientific community.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Biographies and Book Reviews
